settings.pravada_description: Premium Real Hardwood Floors you will live on and love for generations.
settings.evolutionz_description: Created with you in mind. Durable styles including water-resistant flooring designed to fit your lifestyle.

settings.brand_description: Le Soleil, Pravada’s newest collection, explores the natural beauty of wood through natural tones and preservation of the deep character of the European White Oak, in 9.5” wide planks.

settings.learn_description: Pravada is dedicated to practicing sustainable harvesting, low formaldehyde emission and resource management. We maximize efficiency to cut down on raw materials, reducing the impact on the environment.

settings.design_description: A white canvas is a place of infinite possibilities. Our new Canvas Collection explores this realm of possibilities in 8.5″ wide European White Oak planks. This collection is here to inspire you to go beyond your imagination.
